text: Pen Jisas takaw anɨgɨl agak, Binɨb ogɨnap, kɨli ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol olap yɨp gos lɨnɨgup ak nop gel apyap pakɨnɨgab ak, tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal agak. Kɨlop ned tunɨg dam ñɨg solwala yokɨpɨlap ak gɨtep gɨpɨlap agak. Taynen? Binɨb ogɨnap koŋɨm mɨdɨl ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol olap nop gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgabal ak, kɨdek yul awl dɨnɨgabal agak.
